Duvera or Anāthapindika Sutta：Anāthapindika visits the Buddha，who tells him of the five guilty fears - that begotten

by killing， by stealing， by wrong indulgence of sensual lust， by evil speaking，and by the drinking of intoxicants - freedom from which，together with possession of the Noble Insight，enables a man to say that he is destined for Enlightenment．S.v.387f.
